author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for The Disinvited, a psychological dark comedy thriller distributed by Dark Star Pictures. One faithful day of matrimony gets crashed, then chaos unfolds. The Disinvited is coming to Digital on November 18.

Against his--or anyone else's--better judgment, Carl decides to crash an event where he is no longer welcome, setting off a day filled with betrayal, violence, heartache, and exes who should never get back together. When Carl discovers he isn't the only unwanted guest in the desert, he is forced to decide whether to save himself or risk everything for those who have wronged him.

The Disinvited stars Sam Daly Ronnie Gene Blevins, Dani Reynolds, Ryan Vincent D.K. Uzoukwu, Alana Johnston, Samantha Jean Kwok, and more. The film is written and directed by Devin Lawrence.

The Disinvited is coming to Digital on November 18.

#TheDisinvited #Movies #IGN
title: The Disinvited - Official Trailer (2025) Sam Daly Ronnie Gene Blevins, Dani Reynolds

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The sequel to Michael Mann's 1995 crime epic, Heat, is slowly coming together at Amazon MGM after the company bought the rights from Warner Bros. Mann already wrote Heat 2 in novel form back in 2022, with writer Meg Gardiner, so the plan is to adapt the book into movie form. Heat famously brought together Al Pacino and Robert DeNiro in a movie where they would finally share scenes, after the two already became Hollywood legends throughout the 1970s and 80s. Rumor has it that Leonardo DiCaprio is circling the role played by Val Kilmer in the original movie. In other news, the Hulu-exclusive Predator prequel, Prey, might finally get a theatrical release. AMC Theaters may be holding double-feature screenings this November, pairing it with the upcoming sequel, Predator: Badlands. And finally, journey to The Isle of Berk at Universal Epic Universe, and its brand-new ride - Hiccup’s Wing Gliders.
Presented by Universal Orlando Resort and its new theme park, Universal E
title: Heat 2 Slowly Coming Together at Amazon MGM - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

author: IGN
description: Fortnitemares returns! Check out the Fortnite Fortnitemares 2025 cinematic short trailer ahead of the event. Fortnitemares 2025 kicks off on October 9, 2025.
title: Fortnite - Official Fortnitemares 2025 Cinematic Short Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Early Access Season 1 Skate Pass Spotlight Trailer for Skate, the hit free-to-play skateboarding simulation game developed by Full Circle. Players can get the rundown on the over 30 rewards earnable in the Skate Pass for Season 1, including character gear, board items, SVB, and more. The Season 1 Skate Pass for Skate is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and EA App).
title: Skate - Official Early Access Season 1 Skate Pass Spotlight Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Warwick, the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun' Dev Update Gameplay Overview for 2XKO, the hit 2v2 action fighting game developed by Riot Games. Players can join Peter Rosas and Steve Bankert from Riot Games to discuss the gameplay tactics of Warwick, a man who was experimented on that turned him into a beast. Get the rundown on Warwick's moveset and tactics in 2XKO, available now in Early Access for PC (Steam) with a release coming soon for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #Gaming
title: 2XKO - Official 'Warwick, the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun' Dev Update Gameplay Overview

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Season 6 Multiplayer Maps Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, the hit installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can gain access to a suite of new maps for core multiplayer, including Rig, Gravity, Mothball, and Boo-Town, to take the fight to new arenas of engagement. Season 6 for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 kicks off on October 9 with the free content update.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Official Season 6 Multiplayer Maps Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Chrome Alone 2 teaser for this upcoming new, original short. Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Chrome Alone 2 stars Micah Abbey, Shamon Brown Jr., Nicolas Cantu, Brady Noon, Beck Bennett, and Zach Woods.

When a mysterious toy company seeks to profit off the turtles’ new hero status, the brothers follow the clues to New Jersey and make a shocking discovery in this all-new original short. 

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Chrome Alone 2 is written by Andrew Joustra. Based on the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles characters created by Peter Laird and Kevin Eastman. It is produced by Seth Rogen, Evan Goldberg, James Weaver, Jeff Rowe, and Ramsay McBean. Josh Fagen serves as executive producer.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Chrome Alone 2, directed by Kent Seki, opens in theaters December 19, 2025, with The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants.
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Chrome Alone 2 - Official Teaser Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Best Friend' Trailer for Playdate, a comedic action movie starring Alan Ritchson and Kevin James, distributed by Amazon Prime Video. Playdate streams exclusively on Amazon Prime Video on November 12.

When recently unemployed accountant Brian agrees to a playdate with charismatic stay-at-home dad Jeff and their sons, he expects an easy afternoon of small talk and football tossing. Instead, he's thrust into a chaotic scramble to stay alive as they are pursued by a ruthless team of mercenaries. Brian stumbles through one ridiculous obstacle after another, his zero tactical skills a stark contrast to Jeff's oddly prepared demeanor.


Playdate stars Alan Ritchson, Kevin James, Banks Pierce, Benjamin Pajak, Alan Tudyk, Sarah Chalke, Stephen Root, Isla Fischer, and more. The film is directed by Luke Greenfield and written by Neil Goldman.

Playdate streams exclusively on Amazon Prime Video on November 12.
title: Playdate - Official 'Best Friend' Trailer (2025) Kevin James, Alan Ritchson

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Lasombra Trailer for Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, a vampiric action RPG developed by The Chinese Room. 

Players will get acquainted with The Night Clan with the Lasombra trainer of Seattle in action. Lasombra wields the "Oblivion" and "Dominate" clan affinities alongside a passive ability that enables lower visibility when Feeding. Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is launching on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Bloodlines2 #WorldOfDarkness
title: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - Official Lasombra Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the PS5 Pro Features Trailer for Gears of War: Reloaded, the hit third-person cover shooter developed by The Coalition. 

Players can get the premiere Gears of War experience on console with the PS5 Pro enhanced features with 4K visuals, PSSR (PlayStation Spectral Super Resolution support, 120 FPS support for multiplayer, and more. Enjoy lightning-fast load times, improved shadow and reflections quality, and more with Gears of War: Reloaded, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #GearsOfWar #PS5
title: Gears of War: Reloaded - Official PS5 Pro Features Trailer

description:
Don't miss the NVIDIA DLSS 4 Reveal Trailer for Battlefield 6, the next installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Battlefield Studios, DICE, and EA. 

Get a look at the performance levels courtesy of Battlefield 6, implementing NVIDIA's AI-powered NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation and NVIDIA Reflex. Battlefield 6 is launching on October 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
What happens when a young and curious filmmaker challenges his creativity with the limitless possibilities of a fake A.I.? A surprising mix of various stories, from new and old times, about the original myth of Dracula: a vampire hunt, zombies and Dracula crashing a strike, a science-fiction tale aboutVlad the Impaler’s return, an adaptation of the first Romanian vampires novella, a tragic romance, a vulgar folktale, A.I. generated kitsch stories... and much more.

The Romanian film stars Adonis Tanța, Oana Maria Zaharia, Gabriel Spahiu, Ilinca Manolache, Alexandru Dabija, Andrada Balea, Doru Talos, Serban Pavlu, Lukas Miko, and Alexandra Harapu.

Written and directed by Radu Jude.
title: Radu Jude's Dracula - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Adonis Tanța, Oana Maria Zaharia

author: IGN
description:
Tron: Ares is just the 3rd feature film in the franchise that goes back to the groundbreaking 1982 original. 

This installment starring Jared Leto, Evan Peters and Greta Lee (and a little bit of Jeff Bridges), aims for the nostalgic hit of honoring the first Tron while also disregarding a lot of what happened in Tron: Legacy as well. But is an incredible Nine Inch Nails soundtrack from Academy Award winning rock legend Trent Reznor enough to elevate an otherwise stale movie? Maybe Kevin Flynn knows! Check out our Tron: Ares Review to find out!

#IGN #TronAres #Disney
title: Tron: Ares Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Director Modes Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, the hit action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch. 

Players can hunt down the Yotei Six and explore Ezo in three alternate modes. Kurosawa Mode offers a black and white aesthetic with an audio filter to pay homage to the Japanese filmmaker, Watanabe Mode brings a lo-fi music track under the direction of Shinichiro Watanabe, and Miike Mode brings the camera close to the combat with increased blood and mud inspired by the work of Takashi Miike. 

Ghost of Yotei is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GhostofYotei #PlayStation
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Director Modes Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Prepare for a special collab between Street Fighter 6 and landmark adventure novel Banshee's Last Cry to celebrate its 30th anniversary!

Begin a new scenario in World Tour by selecting the Street Fighter's Last Cry option on the One Fateful Day menu to experience this tale filled with mystery and intrigue!

#IGN #StreetFighter6 #FightingGames
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official "Banshee's Last Cry" Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Yooka-Replaylee reviewed by Travis Northup on PC and PlayStation 5, also available on Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch 2.

Yooka-Replaylee aims to overhaul a platformer that was rife with frustrating issues, and while it does feel better for it, none of its changes do enough to bring it close to the 3D platforming standards of today. Improvements to the movement of both your camera and character, the upgraded graphics, and the removal of unnecessary annoyances like having to unlock abilities over time are all fantastic changes. But all of the bending that was done to modernize this thing has resulted in an almost equal number of drawbacks, like a story that has been unsatisfyingly chopped up and a search for Pagies that feels a bit too easy given how many are now crammed into each area. So unless your nostalgia for this kind of 3D platformer is particularly strong, there aren’t a ton of compelling reasons to revisit this one.
title: Yooka-Replaylee Review

author: IGN
description:
Tron and video games have always gone hand-in-hand: after all, the entire story kicked off when Kevin Flynn entered The Grid to prove he'd designed the wildly successful Space Paranoids game for Encom. In that spirit, IGN sat down with the cast of Tron: Ares to learn more about their earliest gaming memories, their experience bringing The Grid into "our" reality, and whether future Tron movies should maintain Ares' ratio of action which takes place in the real world versus the computer.

Tron arcade cabinet image credit: darth-wiki-man
title: Jared Leto's 40-Year Journey to Tron: Ares Started in an Arcade
